title: 41  Raisa G. Matveeva, Industry, 1929
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">41  
Designed by Raisa G. Matveeva (Russian, born 1906)  
Manufactured by Great Ivanovo-Voznesensk Textile Mill (Russia)  
Industry  
1929  
Cotton, plain weave; screen-printed; 9.8 × 10.5 cm (3 7/8 × 4 1/8 in.)  
Harriott A. Fox and Mrs. Siegfried G. Schmidt endowments, 1993.32
